post.desc:
Maybe it's because I never paid attention to that specific part, but I really just noticed that Doremy wears a turtleneck.

Though, looking at her [**portrait**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:Th15Doremy.png) in LoLK... that is supposed to be a turtleneck? Actually, now that I look closer â€“ kinda feels like the AoCF one is an entirely different outfit. Her [**artwork**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:Doremy_Whos_Who.png) from SCoOW seems closer to the original. For one, that is definitely an apron and not her midriff.
